com.topcoder.commons.utils

类 ExceptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topcoder.commons.utils.ExceptionHelper

  • class ExceptionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a static helper class that provides methods for constructing exception instances using reflection. It is used by ValidationUtility, PropertiesUtility and JDBCUtility.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) static <T extends java.lang.Throwable>
      T      		 constructException(java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass, java.lang.String message)
      Constructs an exception of the specified type with the given message.
      (专用程序包) static <T extends java.lang.Throwable>
      T      		 constructException(java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Constructs an exception of the specified type with the given message and cause.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • constructException

        static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> T constructException(java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass,
                                                            java.lang.String message)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an exception of the specified type with the given message.
        参数:
        message - the message
        exceptionClass - the exception class
        返回:
        the constructed exception instance (not null)
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error occurred when using the reflection

      • constructException

        static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> T constructException(java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass,
                                                            java.lang.String message,
                                                            java.lang.Throwable cause)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an exception of the specified type with the given message and cause.
        参数:
        message - the message
        cause - the exception cause
        exceptionClass - the exception class
        返回:
        the constructed exception instance (not null)
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error occurred when using the reflection
